sql-descriptor.sql: CREATE TABLE CATBTERI( TERI_CORP_CODE VARCHAR(4), TERI_PART_NO VARCHAR(20), TERI_EONO VARCHAR(20), TERI_CUMT_NO NUMBER(10, 0), TERI_MATL_CORP VARCHAR(4), TERI_MATL_STND CHAR(1), TERI_MATL_CODE VARCHAR(16), TERI_MATL_APDT CHAR(8), TERI_MATL_GUBN CHAR(3), TERI_MAIN_APPL CHAR(1), TERI_MATL_NAME VARCHAR(50), TERI_MATL_PRIC NUMBER(14, 6), TERI_SCRP_PRIC NUMBER(14, 6), TERI_SPEC_GRAV NUMBER(5, 2), TERI_TYPE_GUBN VARCHAR(8), TERI_TYPE_CODE VARCHAR(8), TERI_TERM_GUBN VARCHAR(8), TERI_TERM_CODE VARCHAR(8), TERI_TON0_GUBN VARCHAR(8), TERI_TON0_CODE VARCHAR(8), TERI_SIZE_GUBN VARCHAR(8), TERI_SIZE_CODE VARCHAR(8), TERI_NETS_LENG NUMBER(10, 2), TERI_NETS_WIDE NUMBER(10, 2), TERI_A NUMBER(10, 2), TERI_B NUMBER(10, 2), TERI_MATT_THIK NUMBER(10, 2), TERI_NET0_WEGT NUMBER(10, 2), TERI_INPT_WEGT NUMBER(10, 2), TERI_UPDT_CMAN VARCHAR(8), TERI_UPDT_DATE VARCHAR(8), TERI_INIT_CMAN VARCHAR(8), TERI_INIT_DATE VARCHAR(8), TERI_PLAT_GUBN VARCHAR(8), TERI_PLAT_CODE VARCHAR(8), TERI_MASK_YN CHAR(1), TERI_TINP_YN CHAR(1), TERI_PLAT_AREA1 NUMBER(12, 5), TERI_PLAT_AREA2 NUMBER(12, 5), TERI_PITC NUMBER(10, 2), CONSTRAINT CATBTERI_PK PRIMARY KEY ( TERI_CORP_CODE, TERI_PART_NO, TERI_EONO, TERI_CUMT_NO ) )
